title: TikTok Faces Scrutiny in State Attorneys General Probe of Online Harms to Children
sub_head: State prosecutors add video-sharing platform to their investigation into social media’s psychological effects on young users
body:
WASHINGTON—A coalition of state attorneys general is launching an investigation into TikTok, seeking information about whether and how the video-sharing platform contributes to online harms to children.
The move is an extension of an investigation unveiled by the same group of eight state attorneys general into Meta Platforms Inc.’s Instagram that focuses on similar concerns. The expansion adds fast-growing TikTok—owned by Beijing-based ByteDance Ltd.—to the list of targets under scrutiny.
